channel.title: My first three programs
channel.description:
if you read my other post i decided to learn python sence i knew ppl in real life that could help me with it. here are my first two programs.(python btw)
str = raw_input("what is your name? ") num = input("whats your telephone number? ") print "your name is",str,"and your phone number is",num
string1 = raw_input('string1: ') string2 = raw_input('string2: ') int1 = int(raw_input('integer 1: ')) int2 = int(raw_input('integer 2: ' )) print string1 + string2 print int1 + int2
while 1: print"help me!"

item.title: My first three programs

item.description:
@1_dum_taco wrote:

if you read my other post i decided to learn python sence i knew ppl in real life that could help me with it. here are my first two programs.(python btw)

str = raw_input("what is your name? ")
num = input("whats your telephone number? ")
print “your name is”,str,“and your phone number is”,num

string1 = raw_input('string1: ')
string2 = raw_input('string2: ')
int1 = int(raw_input('integer 1: '))
int2 = int(raw_input('integer 2: ’ ))
print string1 + string2
print int1 + int2

while 1:
print"help me!"
